CachePanel - Class in fotoshop.GUI
A JPanel for displaying the a cache of stored images.
CachePanel(JFrame) - Constructor for class fotoshop.GUI.CachePanel
Instantiate the CachePanel.
CachePanel.CacheButtonListener - Class in fotoshop.GUI
The ActionListener for each cache button.
CachePanel.CacheButtonListener(String) - Constructor for class fotoshop.GUI.CachePanel.CacheButtonListener
The Cache buttons action listener is instantiated with a string key obtained from the map key value passed in on populating the cache.
cloneStack() - Method in class fotoshop.ImageStack
Clone this current ImageStack object
ColorImage - Class in fotoshop
Extends standard BufferedImage class with convenience functions for getting/setting pixel values using the standard Color class and converting the raster to a standard 24-bit direct colour format.
ColorImage(BufferedImage, String) - Constructor for class fotoshop.ColorImage
Create a ColorImage copied from a BufferedImage Convert to 24-bit direct colour
ColorImage(int, int, String) - Constructor for class fotoshop.ColorImage
Create a ColorImage with specified size and 24-bit direct colour
Command - Class in fotoshop
This class is adapted from the "World of Zuul" application.
Command(CommandWord, PropertyMessage) - Constructor for class fotoshop.Command
Create a command object.
CommandWord - Enum in fotoshop
Representations for all the valid command words for the game along with a string in a particular language.
CommandWords - Class in fotoshop
This class is derived from the "World of Zuul" application, author Michael Kolling and David J.
CommandWords() - Constructor for class fotoshop.CommandWords
CommandWords - initialise the command words by retrieving those defined within the ResourceManagers CommandWords bundle
- if no CommandWords are found, will default to originally set validCommands values
